messages.subject: Sandra and a book
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nah, he ll just say then write a book, and I d rather stay just *sigh*... Oh, no, Sandra . .  .do the world a favor and write that book! No pressure from
messages.messageBody:
>I'm going to go and tell my husband.
Nah, he'll just say "then write a book," and I'd rather stay just *sigh*...

Oh, no, Sandra . . .do the world a favor and write that book!
No pressure from me, here . . . just WORLDS of encouragement and
understanding that I'm sure you cannot imagine just when that would fit
into an already overflowing life.

Lee


North Country Farms
An Eco-Tourism Destination
P.O. Box 723
Kilauea, Kauai, HI 96754
